title: Sampler, 1796
medium:
Medium: linen embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, satin, chain, overcasting, star and knot stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Bands of white work vertically divided into two columns.  At lower left, crowned double-headed eagle.  At lower right, crowned heart, initials, and date.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, 1796.
1796. Medium: linen embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross, satin, chain, overcasting, star and knot stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-164.
